1.0.0.en: Initial version of a standalone app for Yeelights. Please migrate your devices from the Xiaomi Mi Home app to this dedicated Yeelights app.

1.0.1.en: Initial version of a standalone app for Yeelights. Please migrate your devices from the Xiaomi Mi Home app to this dedicated Yeelights app.

1.0.2.en: Fix for Yeelights that have been online and come online again.

1.0.3.en: Small fixes to improve pairing process and avoid crashes when removing Yeelight devices.

1.0.4.en: Small improvements to avoid offline devices in certain cases like temporary unreachable devices due to bad WiFi.

1.0.5.en: Fixed a bug where certain ceiling lights (ceiling4 and ceiling10) did not get the right capabilities during pairing. Please re-pair if you are missing color settings.

1.1.0.en: Fixed issue with dim duration. Added action cards for onoff, dim and temperature for ambilight (ceiling 650 and meteorite).

1.1.1.en: Added action cards for saving and restoring the state of the light which is usefull for switching between scenes.

3.0.0.en: Update to SDK3 (require Homey firmware 5.x) and some minor improvements.
